short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your website or dev on another server without changing DNS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hosts.Click is a free tool that allows developers and website administrators to test their websites before updating DNS records. It provides a temporary URL that redirects traffic to a specified IP address and domain, enabling instant testing without modifying local hosts files or waiting for DNS propagation.
